product_name: NRS Kicker Remix Water Shoes - Men's
long_description: The men's NRS Kicker Remix Water Shoes provide superior insulation, traction and protection in a compact, comfortable design that any paddler-stand up or sit-on-top-will love. 3mm Terraprene(TM) neoprene uppers and insoles feature a titanium laminate that reflects heat back to your feet. Traction soles wrap around the uppers, adding protection to the sides of your feet. Shoe-top drawcord keeps your foot snug and secure. 2mm plastic shim in the sole gives added protection from sharp rocks. Armor patches guard the upper from abrasion and add even more protection for your foot. .
short_description: The men's NRS Kicker Remix Water Shoes provide superior insulation, traction and protection in a compact, comfortable design that any paddler-stand up or sit-on-top-will love.
